price: (12) The people of Noah denied before them,[1526] and the companions of the well[1527] and Thamūd
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
footnotes:
[1526]- i.e., before the disbelievers of Makkah.
[1527]- See footnote to 25:38.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
